mapper.select: select ORDERID, CORPID, GROUPID, CUSTOMERTEL1, CUSTOMERTEL2, CUSTOMEREMAIL, CUSTOMERQQ, CUSTOMERMSN, CUSTOMERZIPCODE, CUSTOMERFAX, SHOPTYPEID, SHOPTYPE, SALESOURCE, MONEYTYPE, MONEYORIGIN, ORIGINMONEYTOTAL, MONEYTOTAL, ORDERNUM, ORDERTIME, UPLOADTIME, PAYTIME, EXPRESSTYPE, TRANSACTIONID, MONEYEXPRESS, ORIGINMONEYEXPRE, EXPRESSMONEYTYPE, STATUS, ORIGINFINALVALUEFEE, FINALVALUEFEE, FINALVALUEFEEMONEYTYPE, LATESTSHIPDATE, CUSTOMERID, CUSTOMERNAME, CUSTOMERCOUNTRY, CUSTOMERPROVINCE, CUSTOMERCITY, CUSTOMERADDRESS, CUSTOMERADDRESS1, CUSTOMERADDRESS2, CUSTOMERADDRESS3, CUSTOMERADDRESSALL from db_amazonorder where ORDERID = #{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select ORDERID, CORPID, GROUPID, CUSTOMERTEL1, CUSTOMERTEL2, CUSTOMEREMAIL, CUSTOMERQQ, CUSTOMERMSN, CUSTOMERZIPCODE, CUSTOMERFAX, SHOPTYPEID, SHOPTYPE, SALESOURCE, MONEYTYPE, MONEYORIGIN, ORIGINMONEYTOTAL, MONEYTOTAL, ORDERNUM, ORDERTIME, UPLOADTIME, PAYTIME, EXPRESSTYPE, TRANSACTIONID, MONEYEXPRESS, ORIGINMONEYEXPRE, EXPRESSMONEYTYPE, STATUS, ORIGINFINALVALUEFEE, FINALVALUEFEE, FINALVALUEFEEMONEYTYPE, LATESTSHIPDATE, CUSTOMERID, CUSTOMERNAME, CUSTOMERCOUNTRY, CUSTOMERPROVINCE, CUSTOMERCITY, CUSTOMERADDRESS, CUSTOMERADDRESS1, CUSTOMERADDRESS2, CUSTOMERADDRESS3, CUSTOMERADDRESSALL from db_amazonorder
mapper.sql: ORDERID , CORPID , GROUPID , CUSTOMERTEL1 , CUSTOMERTEL2 , CUSTOMEREMAIL , CUSTOMERQQ , CUSTOMERMSN , CUSTOMERZIPCODE , CUSTOMERFAX , SHOPTYPEID , SHOPTYPE , SALESOURCE , MONEYTYPE , MONEYORIGIN , ORIGINMONEYTOTAL , MONEYTOTAL , ORDERNUM , ORDERTIME , UPLOADTIME , PAYTIME , EXPRESSTYPE , TRANSACTIONID , MONEYEXPRESS , ORIGINMONEYEXPRE , EXPRESSMONEYTYPE , STATUS , ORIGINFINALVALUEFEE , FINALVALUEFEE , FINALVALUEFEEMONEYTYPE , LATESTSHIPDATE , CUSTOMERID , CUSTOMERNAME , CUSTOMERCOUNTRY , CUSTOMERPROVINCE , CUSTOMERCITY , CUSTOMERADDRESS , CUSTOMERADDRESS1 , CUSTOMERADDRESS2 , CUSTOMERADDRESS3 , CUSTOMERADDRESSALL

ORDERID = #{orderid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
CORPID = #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
GROUPID = #{groupid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
CUSTOMERTEL1 = #{customertel1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
CUSTOMERTEL2 = #{customertel2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
CUSTOMEREMAIL = #{customeremail,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
CUSTOMERQQ = #{customerqq,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
CUSTOMERMSN = #{customermsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
CUSTOMERZIPCODE = #{customerzipcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
CUSTOMERFAX = #{customerfax,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SHOPTYPEID = #{shoptypeid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SHOPTYPE = #{shoptype,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SALESOURCE = #{salesource,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
MONEYTYPE = #{moneytype,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
MONEYORIGIN = #{moneyorigin,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
ORIGINMONEYTOTAL = #{originmoneytotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
MONEYTOTAL = #{moneytotal,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
ORDERNUM = #{ordernum,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
ORDERTIME = #{ordertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
UPLOADTIME = #{uploadtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
PAYTIME = #{paytime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
EXPRESSTYPE = #{expresstype,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
TRANSACTIONID = #{transactionid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
MONEYEXPRESS = #{moneyexpress,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
ORIGINMONEYEXPRE = #{originmoneyexpre,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
EXPRESSMONEYTYPE = #{expressmoneytype,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
ORIGINFINALVALUEFEE = #{originfinalvaluefee,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
FINALVALUEFEE = #{finalvaluefee,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
FINALVALUEFEEMONEYTYPE = #{finalvaluefeemoneytype,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
LATESTSHIPDATE = #{latestshipdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
CUSTOMERID = #{customerid,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
CUSTOMERNAME = #{customername,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
CUSTOMERCOUNTRY = #{customercountry,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
CUSTOMERPROVINCE = #{customerprovince,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
CUSTOMERCITY = #{customercity,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
CUSTOMERADDRESS = #{customeraddress,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
CUSTOMERADDRESS1 = #{customeraddress1,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
CUSTOMERADDRESS2 = #{customeraddress2,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
CUSTOMERADDRESS3 = #{customeraddress3,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
CUSTOMERADDRESSALL = #{customeraddressall,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}
and 1=1
